text: Guyyaa guyyaadhaan sangaan tokko, hoolonni gagabbatoon jaʼaa fi indaanqoowwan muraasni, guyyaa kudhan kudhaniin immoo daadhiin wayinii kan gosa hundaa baayʼinaan naa qopheeffama ture. Kana hunda malees ani takkumaa nyaata bulchaaf ramadamuu qabu hin gaafanne; gaaffiin kun saboota kanneenitti baʼaa guddaa tureetii.
